div.p: RAVET an infect ſhaped like a may-bug, or cock chaffel, (ſee Scarabæus), with which the iſland of Guadalouρe is much peſtered. It has a ſtinking ſmell, preys upon paper, books, and furniture, and whatever

they do not gnaw is diſcojoured by their Oi dure. Theſe naſty infects, which are very numerous, and appear chiefly by night, would be intolerable, were it not for a large ſpider, ſome of them as long as a man’s fiſt, which intangles them in it>web, and otherwiſe furprifes them. Οη .which account the'inhabitants of the iſland are very careful of theſe ſpiders.
